title: On my Huawei Summit U8651S, is a multimedia message affected by the file size, video format, or resolution?
answer:
1.  If an audio file or video file exceeds 300KB, it cannot be attached to the message.
	
2.  If a picture size exceeds the limit, it is automatically compressed.Â  Then it can be attached to the multimedia message and the received picture will be in low-resolution.
keywords: multimedia message format resolution Huawei U8651S
